name: MEN'S MINI GROOMING KIT
description:
Three piece kit provides essentials needed to soothe, soften and nourish the skin + hair, post shave or no shave!

Features mini sized versions of
AFTERSHAVE TONIC - our take on an old bay rum, tones, soothing to just shaved skin, smells amazing
FACE+BEARD ELIXIR - lightweight, non-greasy, fast absorbing, conditions facial hair + softens skin, balancing
HAIR WAX CLAY POMADE - light hold, matte finish, enhances texture, a little goes a long way, try it on your mustache!

Great gift for the holidays!


KIT INCLUDES

-----------------------

- BAY RUM + HOLY BASIL AFTERSHAVE TONIC 1 OZ.
- FACE + BEARD ELIXIR .25 OZ.
- HAIR WAX POMADE .50 OZ.

in a hand-stamped muslin bag




INGREDIENTS

----------------------

AFTERSHAVE TONIC
witch hazel extract*, dark rum infused with all spice berries*, ginger root*, cloves*, orange peel*, frankincense**, palm-free vegetable glycerine*, holy basil (tulsi) hydrosol*, essential oils of west indies bay* and lime*.

FACE + BEARD ELIXIR
jojoba oil**, grapeseed oil**, essential oils of cypress*, lavender*, cedarwood*, bergamot* (bf) and german chamomile*.

HAIR WAX CLAY POMADE
coconut oil*, shea butter*, beeswax*, castor oil*, french green clay, vitamin e (non-gmo), essential oils of rosemary*, lavender*, clary sage and lime peel*.
*certified organic **wild harvested

We encourage you to look up our ingredients online or in a herbal handbook to learn about their benefits and why we use them. If you have any questions, please contact us.




all photos and text
copyright © 2013 
The October Union

options.name: cleansing grains in place of aftershave

name: BAY RUM + HOLY BASIL After Shave Tonic
description:
We took the classic recipe, made it the old-fashioned way, then added our magic to create a truly unique, all natural after shave splash.

DESCRIPTION
---------------------
Jamaican dark rum and organic witch hazel extract are infused (for 6 weeks) with freshly grated ginger root, all spice berries, orange peel and cloves. Essential oils of West Indies bay leaf and lime peel combine to give the bay rum fragrance its distinctive woody, sweet, and spicy scent. Organic and palm-free vegetable glycerine is a natural humectant, pulling moisture into the skin.

Now here's the magic: we added wild harvested frankincense powder and holy basil (Tulsi, a sacred healing herb) hydrosol for their anti-inflammatory, anti-bacterial and healing properties, said to be helpful in skin with excess oiliness or clogged pores. The result is a deeply therapeutic scent that is light and refreshing, never overwhelming.

Not manly; Godly.


TO USE
------------
use as an after shave splash to soothe, tone and tighten skin. Can also be used on neck and chest as a light "cologne". This tonic is gentle and full of big love.


INGREDIENTS
---------------------
MADE WITH ☮ ♡ & :
witch hazel extract*, holy basil hydrosol*, dark rum infused with all spice berries*, ginger root*, cloves*, orange peel*, frankincense resin powder**, palm-free vegetable glycerine*, essential oils*.
*organic **wild harvested
Full ingredient list and directions for use included on the product itself



CUSTOMER REVIEWS
---------------------------------

"Even my husband who is super picky about products loves loves his aftershave!"

"The aftershave leaves me feeling ready for the day. I also really like how it primes the face for the Face Elixir"

"I really like the Bay Rum Aftershave because it leaves me smelling really manly:)"

"it smells amazing!"



☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾
3.3 oz. {100ml} in an amber glass flask bottle

name: BOTANICAL PERFUME SOLID
description:
Our Botanical Perfume Solids are our own unique blend of organic essential oils, absolutes and resins, hand blended into a base of organic jojoba oil and organic beeswax.

Every perfume is hand-blended and hand-poured individually
or in very small batches so that full care and intention go in to every one.

Natural perfume will evolve over time and should be applied to the skin in order to truly unfold.
Most of our scents are unisex and can be worn alone or mixed and
matched to create your own blend.


☽☽☽ Available Scents ☾☾☾

❤NEW❤
R I T U A L - the ancient Indian tradition of Ayurveda recommends that women wear jasmine on their hands, patchouli on their necks, musk on the abdomen, sandalwood on their thighs, saffron on their feet and amber on the breasts. This sensual blend is inspired by this recommendation.

❤NEW❤
C H U R C H -frankincense, myrrh, patchouli, sandalwood, rose, clary sage, cinnamon.
Spiritual and meditative. Incense lingering in an old, wooden house of worship.

S H A M A N - aged patchouli, lavender, cedarwood and california white sage.
Earthy and fresh, unisex and everyone's favorite.

W H I T E M A G I C -frankincense, ylang ylang, fresh ginger and orange.
Warming, heady floral and fresh citrus.

J A S M I N E -jasmine absolute, benzoin and neroli.
Sweet and nostalgic, just like the creamy white flowers.

H U N T E R -fir absolute, fir needle, cedarwoods and pine.
Forest like with notes of fruity jam.

S H R I N E -benzoin, labdanum and organic vanillia absolute.
Our take on 'amber', only drier, smokier and better.

H A R L O T -tobacco absolute, rose, clove and pepper.
Exotic and spiced, the delicate flower bathed in sweetened tobacco.

B L U M O O N -lavender, ylang ylang, jasmine and pink grapefruit.
Almost sedative, completely peaceful. Light floral with uplifting citrus.


☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾
BOTANICAL PERFUME SOLID comes packaged in a 1/4 oz aluminum tin.
☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

Some resins are not oil soluble and may contain natural sediment. This is normal and adds to the natural beauty of the perfume!

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

HANDMADE IN CALIFORNIA

We're always brewing something new, check back often for new potions.

name: MINERAL SALT - Bath Soak
description:
♆ MINERAL SALT ♆
♒♒ Bath Soak ♒♒


Made with a superior blend of 5 ancient crystal salts including Dead Sea salt, Himalayan Pink salt, Red Alaea salt, Hawaiian Black Lava salt and Epsom. Use to infuse your bath water with beneficial minerals to help relieve tension, ease sore muscles and soothe your spirits. Infused with therapeutic essential oils of fresh Fir Needle, calming Lavender and Seaweed absolute.
This scent is crisp and uplifting, yet calming and clearing. We've named it "SEA FLOOR".

Bathing in sea salt has been know to increase detoxification, enhance circulation, reduced stress and improve skin integrity. Salts contain high levels of sulfur, potassium, calcium and magnesium; all beneficial in aiding the body in absorption of nourishment and to help release waste and impurities.


TO USE: Add a handful (or two) to running bath water. Breathe deeply, relax and be peace.

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽⊖☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾
8 oz. in a frosted glass bottle
☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽⊖☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾




HANDMADE IN CALIFORNIA

copyright © 2013

name: HAIR WAX CLAY POMADE
description:
HAIR WAX POMADE
with french green clay


All natural hair styling wax gives a soft hold while providing moisture and nourishment to hair. Organic oils of coconut and castor feed the hair with healthy nutrients and have been found to help with hair growth. French green clay adds a natural matte finish.
Perfect for all hair types, especially natural, thin or dry.
Naturally add texture, volume, nourishment, softness and a light, fresh scent that is never overbearing.

For ladies, use a small amount on fingertips to add light volume to roots, texture and moisture to ends, define curls, tame frizzies. Can also be used on eyebrows.
For dudes, use for a light hold to keep your handsome gentleman's cut in place without having a "glue head" or looking like a greaser (which can be fine, if that's what you're into). Can also be used on whatever facial hair you may be workin' with.


MADE WITH ☮, ❤, &
organic coconut oil
organic castor oil
organic shea butter
organic beeswax
french green clay
organic essential oils of
lavender, rosemary, clary sage and lime
vitamin e oil (non-gmo)

As always, free from petroleum, dyes, alcohols, peg-whatevers and synthetic fragrances so your hair and scalp can breathe and be healthy.

Choose size:
1 oz. tin
2 oz. compostable/biodegradable cup


HANDMADE IN CALIFORNIA



all text and images
copyright 2013 © The October Union

name: BOTANICAL PERFUME OIL - SAMPLE SET
description:
Our Botanical Perfume oils are now available in a sample pack, the perfect way to sample the scents that intrigue you. Give as a gift, to another or treat yourself, you deserve to!

Our Botanical Perfume Oils are our own unique blends of organic essential oils, absolutes and resins hand blended into a base of organic jojoba oil.


You choose your three scents:

❤NEW❤
R I T U A L - the ancient Indian tradition of Ayurveda recommends that women wear jasmine on their hands, patchouli on their necks, musk on the abdomen, sandalwood on their thighs, saffron on their feet and amber on the breasts. This sensual blend is inspired by this recommendation.

❤NEW❤
C H U R C H -frankincense, myrrh, patchouli, sandalwood, rose, clary sage, cinnamon.
Spiritual and meditative. Incense lingering in an old, wooden house of worship.

S H A M A N - aged patchouli, lavender, cedarwood and california white sage.
Earthy and fresh, unisex and everyone's favorite.

W H I T E M A G I C -frankincense, ylang ylang, fresh ginger and orange.
Warming, heady floral and fresh citrus.

J A S M I N E -jasmine absolute, benzoin and neroli.
Sweet and nostalgic, just like the creamy white flowers.

H U N T E R -fir absolute, fir needle, cedarwoods and pine.
Forest like with notes of fruity jam.

S H R I N E -benzoin, labdanum and organic vanillia absolute.
Our take on 'amber', only drier, smokier and better.

H A R L O T -tobacco absolute, rose, clove and pepper.
Exotic and spiced, the delicate flower bathed in sweetened tobacco.

B L U M O O N -lavender, ylang ylang, jasmine and pink grapefruit.
Almost sedative, completely peaceful. Light floral with uplifting citrus.



Each scent comes in a 1/2 dram glass vial with black cap.
You will receive three vials packaged in a muslin bag, hand stamped with our logo.

PLEASE SPECIFY YOUR THREE SCENT CHOICES IN NOTE TO SELLER UPON CHECKOUT.



Some resins are not oil soluble and may contain natural sediment.
This is normal, simply roll the bottle between your palms to re-blend the materials and oil.

please note: photo shows one (1) dram size vials. You will receive three (3) 1/2 dram vials, filled.







All text and images property of The October Union.
Copyright © 2013 The October Union

name: NIGHT OIL
description:
unique, therapeutic nighttime treatment 

Perfect for all skin types, this oil was designed nourish and renew while you sleep. Cold-pressed, organic Hemp Seed and Passionflower Oils are rich in vitamins and essential fatty acids which hydrate and soothe dry, irritated skin. Organic pomegranate oil is high in anti-oxidants and fights free radicals. Infused with a unique blend of essential oils, renowned for their deeply healing and therapeutic properties:

FRANKINCENSE ♥ calming, promotes regeneration of healthy cells, may help in healing wounds.

HELICHRYSUM ♥ connects mind and body, anti-inflammatory and may help with old scars.

CANNABIS FLOWER (Hemp) ♥ may help with skin irritations, promotes feelings of tranquility and peace.

SANDALWOOD ♥ deeply grounding, beneficial for both dry skin and oily skin.

YLANG YLANG ♥ balancing, calms stress and anxiety, a known aphrodisiac

LAVENDER ♥ reviving and soothing, great for all skin types


☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾
 .5 fl oz. (15 ml.) in a violet glass bottle with dropper top
☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾


TO USE: Apply only a few drops to freshly cleansed, damp skin. Use gentle, upward strokes to massage the oil into the skin. Drift away to sweet dreams...

To prep the skin and receive the maximum benefit of this product, we recommend first cleansing with our 
♥CLEANSING GRAINS or 
♥HONEY + ROSE SCRUB  

Then toning the skin with our 
♥HERBAL FACE TONIC


MADE WITH ☮ ♡ &:
Cold pressed, organic hemp seed and passionflower oils, organic pomegranate seed oil, pure essential oil blend.
Ingredient list and directions for use also included on the product itself

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾


PLEASE NOTE: The cannabis flower essential oil used in this product is steam distilled and contains no THC. Therefore, it has no psychoactive properties and is not a drug. It is safe and completely legal. If you would like the cannabis flower essential oil to be removed from your purchase, we would be more than happy to remove it for you. The price of the product however, will still remain the same.

name: HONEY + ROSE FACE SCRUB
description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ HONEY + ROSE Face Scrub ☾☾☾☾♡♥

A gentle exfoliator packed with fragrant organic rose petals, the "Flower of the Heart", to bring balance to the skin. Wild, raw honey draws impurities out + moisture in while Himalayan pink salt helps to tone and absorb excess oil. Perfect for all skin types.

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽ ☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

Use to clean the face 1-3 times a week, use a spoon or clean fingers scoop out desired amount. Gently massage on to damp skin for one minute then rinse with warm water.
Can be used as a hydrating mask, leave on for up to 10 minutes.


Ingredients: ☮ ♡ & 
Wild Raw Honey - draws in moisture, soothes, heals and nourishes
Organic Rose Petals - heart opening, aromatic and hydrating
Organic Oats - soothing and anti-inflammatory, good for dry skin
Organic Blue Cornmeal - gentle exfoliator, sacred grain
Himalayan Pink Salt- drawing and cleansing, antiseptic and astringent

♥ 2 oz. // 4 oz. 
♥ glass jar
♥ HANDMADE IN CALIFORNIA

copyright ©2013 The October Union.

name: CRYSTAL INFUSED ORGANIC HYDROSOL MIST
description:
PLEASE READ: ROSE+ROSE QUARTZ IS ON BACKORDER. WILL SHIP JANUARY 4th 2014.



Refresh and hydrate your face, body and hair with this beautiful flower water. Organic distillate infused with corresponding quartz crystals for a higher vibration. The crystals are in the bottle! 

Keep a bottle in your purse for an anywhere, anytime reset button.

CHOOSE:
ROSE HYDROSOL + ROSE QUARTZ CRYSTAL (WILL SHIP JAN. 4th)
Rose Hydrosol Properties ♥ opening, connects mind + body, aphrodisiac, calming, promotes feelings of love and self-worth. Skin tonic, antiseptic, relieves dry skin, can help with PMS and mood swings.
Rose Quartz Crystal Properties ♥ assists with healing, heart opening, meditation, calming for emotional, spiritual and physical balance, inspires the love of beauty, in self and others, in nature. Dissolves emotional wounds, fears and resentments.

LAVENDER HYDROSOL + AMETHYST CRYSTAL
Lavender Hydrosol Properties ♥ provides emotional balance, both invigorating and calming, acts as a humectant, helps to balance the skin. Its antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties can be helpful in the prevention and healing of acne. It is also known for its ability to help cool sunburn and sooth insect bites. Relieves headache, sleep aid.
Amethyst Crystal Properties ♥ helps to focus and center, assists meditation, relieves headache, respiratory system, can assist in overcoming fears and increase positive spiritual feelings.

LEMON VERBENA HYDROSOL + CITRINE CRYSTAL
Lemon Verbena Hydrosol Properties ♥ powerful mental relaxant and stress buster, mentally build confidence, anti-inflammatory, balancing, calming, digestive, general tonic. Can have sedative qualities. Good for combination and oily skin.
Citrine Crystal Properties ♥ magnify and clarify personal power and energy, energies of good fortune and good luck, combat negative energy, increases positivity



MADE WITH ☮ & ♡

in 2 oz. amber glass bottle

description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ POMEGRANATE + COCOA TINTED LIP SALVE ☾☾☾☾♡♥


Deeply delicious, organic lip salve in Pomegranate + Cocoa. Naturally tinted with raw cocoa powder and alkanet root. Perfect for those who prefer a slight tint, light scent and healthy ingredients on their pout.


SCENT: light chocolate with a tiny hint of fruit

SHADE: super subtle dark berry

TEXTURE: thin and smooth, more like a salve than a chapstick

♥ We love to dab it on in the middle of our lips building the color up a little- and sometimes a little touch to the cheeks when we feel extra naughty ♥


MADE WITH ☮ ♡ &:
Coconut Oil*
Cocoa Butter*
Beeswax

name: RITUAL BATH
description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ RITUAL BATH ☾☾☾☾♡♥

Inspired by Cleopatra.

A blend of organic flowers and herbs, spices, salts and clay - this is no ordinary bath soak.
Let yourself be transported to another time... feel like an Ancient Queen bathing in pure botanical decadance... designed to empower, engulf and raise your vibration to the Divine Goddess you are.

Dead Sea and Himalayan pink salts are used to detoxify and relax the body, raising one's awareness. Organic botanicals, such as lavender, sage and calendula, cleanse and calm. Added spices of cinnamon, clove, nutmeg and all spice lend astringent and toning properties.

TO USE: Light your candles, run your bath....
Fill included cotton bag with 1-2 tablespoons of mix, drop into bath or hang form faucet under running water to infuse bath water. While bathing, use the wet bag, contents and all, to lovingly wash face and neck, breasts and belly, hips, hair and body, occasionally re-wetting and squeezing softly.

MADE WITH ☮ ♡ &:
oats*, Moroccan rhassoul clay, Dead Sea salt, Himalayan Pink salt, lavender flowers*, chamomile flowers*, calendula flowers*, wildharvested white sage, peppermint leaves*, orange peel*, cornflowers*, rose petals*, elder flowers*, wildharvested frankincense resin powder, cinnamon*, clove*, all spice berries* and nutmeg*. *certified organic ingredients.
Full ingredient list and directions for use included on the product itself

PLEASE NOTE: This product is not recommended for use while pregnant. Nor is this product suitable for children. Please be aware of any know health issues or allergies before purchasing any of our products. Thank you!

6 oz. in a glass jar with black screw lid. Includes a reusable cotton muslin bag.

name: GREEN TEA UNDER EYE ROLLER
description:
This unique formula of soothing botanicals and flower hydrosol will help to constrict blood vessels and reduce under eye puffiness. Keep it in the refrigerator, the cool temperature will feel so good - You'll feel it working!

to use:
Simply roll under eye from corner to corner 3-5 times, then gently dab away any excess. Alternatively, apply to tip of ring or pinky finger and gently dab under the eyes.
Do not get in to the eyes.

MADE WITH ☮ ♡ &:
Organic witch hazel extract ♥ soothes, tones, shrinks blood vessels
Organic Jasmine Green Tea ♥ reduces swelling and puffiness
Organic Comfrey ♥ stimulates cell growth and repairs
Organic Calendula ♥ a know healer used to reduce inflammation

Ingredient list and directions for use included on the product itself


Size is 1/3 oz. (10 ml.) frosted green glass bottle with roll on applicator top

      a Potion For Everything

A simple, all purpose herbal salve for use on cuts,
scrapes, bruises, minor burns, insect bites, cracked
or dry skin, scalp and hair....everywhere!

Made with organic comfrey and calendula infused olive oil, 
organic hemp seed oil, shea butter, jojoba oil,

name: FACE ELIXIR
description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ FACE ELIXIR ☾☾☾☾♡♥

Our daily facial oils are designed for each skin type. A special blend of essential oils to assist with your skins needs carried in a base of organic jojoba and kukui nut oils. 
We chose jojoba and kukui oils as the base because these carrier oils are appropriate for all skin types and are the closest to our skins natural sebum, ensuring excellent absorption. 
Each FACE ELIXIR also contains organic carrot seed oil, a highly nutritious plant, containing high amounts of vitamins A, C, B and B2. Carrot seed oil has been know to help with skin conditions such as eczema, dermatitis and wrinkles.

Choose from:

HYDRATING - for Dry, Sensitive or Mature skin - with sandalwood, chamomile, frankincense, helichrysum, geranium and rose.

BALANCING - for Normal and Combination skin - with geranium, lavender, chamomile, ylang ylang and neroli essential oils

REGULATING - for Oily or Blemish prone skin - with cypress, lavender, juniper, eucalyptus, lemon and cedarwood essential oils.


TO USE: After cleansing and toning, use 1-2 pumps and apply to slightly damp skin. Use gentle, upward strokes to massage the oil into the skin. If desired, tissue off excess.


MADE WITH ☮ ♡ &:
organic jojoba oil, organic kukui oil, organic carrot seed oil, organic pomegranate seed oil and pure essential oil blend.

description:
3 PIECE MINI FACIAL SET

Our Mini Facial Set is all you need to cleanse, tone and moisturize the skin. Perfect for travel or to give as a thoughtful gift. This set is beneficial for all skin types/concerns.

name: CHARCOAL DETOX MASK + SPOT FIX
description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ CHARCOAL DETOX SPOT FIX ☾☾☾☾♡♥

Ouch! Those sensitive, painful and annoying little pimples - we just wanna squeeze em and poke and push em back in... yikes!
First, stay calm,
best to not touch or especially squeeze.
Second, mix up a bit of this "dirt- y" looking powder and apply to t-zone or just individual blemishes. Sit back while the potion NATURALLY absorbs excess dirt and oil, reduces redness and soothes the inflamed skin.

An effective blend of warming spices to encourage circulation, pure moroccan clay to absorb excess sebum and organic herbs for their soothing and healing properties. Frankincense powder is naturally anti-septic and anti-inflammatory. The added activated charcoal powder helps to pull toxins from the skin. Use as a spot treatment or a mask.

Because the clay and charcoal powder have an electrical charge,
PLEASE REFRAIN FROM USING ANY METAL UTENSILS WITH THIS PRODUCT.

TO USE: As a spot treatment - In a small glass or ceramic dish, mix equal parts powder and water and apply to blemishes using a Q-tip. Leave on to dry or up to 20 minutes then rinse off with warm water. If desired, use a wet dark colored washcloth to remove any remaining product. Can be left on overnight but you may have a temporarily stained pillowcase.
As a mask - same as spot treatment but you'll use it on most of your face, avoid delicate eye area.
A slight warming sensation is normal. If you experience any burning, please rinse off immediately.

MADE WITH ☮ ♡ &:
pure rhassoul clay, raw cocoa* powder, lavender* flowers, neem* leaf, marshmallow* root, wild-harvested frankincense powder, himalayan pink salt, aluminum free baking soda, activated charcoal powder, cloves*, cinnamon*, nutmeg*, turmeric* and cayenne* pepper.
*certified organic ingredients
Full ingredient list and directions for use also included on the product label.

1oz glass jar

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

name: HERBAL FACE TONIC
description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ HERBAL FACE TONIC ☾☾☾☾♡♥

Based upon the 2,000 year old recipe, "The Queen of Hungary Water",
this ancient potion was rumored to be formulated by Gypsies and used for numerous beauty applications as well as a cure-all.

Colorful and fragrant herbs and flowers are slowly infused into raw, organic apple cider vinegar, extracting the tremendous healing properties of the plants.
This herbal vinegar based facial tonic can be used to even out skin tone, neutralize the pH of the skin and prepare the skin to be moisturized.


TO USE: After cleansing and before moisturizing, use 2-3 sprays on a pure cotton pad and apply to damp face and decolletage. Alternatively, spray into palm, rub hands together and pat onto damp skin. Avoid the delicate eye area.
We recommend this product be used in your nighttime skin care ritual.

Follow with our:
FACE ELIXIR or NIGHT OIL

MADE WITH ☮ ♡ & :
Organic herbs such as sage, comfrey, elder flowers, rose petals and more, raw organic apple cider vinegar with "the Mother", organic rosewater.

Full ingredient list and directions for use included on the product itself

packaged in an amber glass bottle with a spray or screw top
available in 2 oz. or 4 oz. size

name: CLEANSING GRAINS - Soap Free Face Wash
description:
A simple blend of pure earth clay, oats and rose, lavender, chamomile and calendula flowers to naturally cleanse, soothe and soften the skin.
Suitable for all skin types, this soap-free face cleanser is gentle enough for everyday use and can also be used as a weekly mask.

TO USE: For everyday cleansing, pour a small amount of grains in to palm and slowly add enough water to form a paste. Gently massage the grains onto damp skin for one minute then rinse off with warm water.

To use as a mask, mix as directed then apply to damp skin to leave on for up to 10 minutes.
Customize your mask depending on your skin's needs, replace plain water with: 
plain yogurt - for cooling and to combat redness, good for oily skin
avocado or banana - deeply nourishing for dry skin, anti aging
rosewater or other plant hydrosols - great for sensitive skin
red wine - highly antioxidant, stimulating and detoxifying

We recommend following with our
HERBAL FACE TONIC
then suitable FACE ELIXIR

MADE WITH ☮ ♡ & :
organic flowers, oats and clay
Full ingredient list and directions for use included on the product itself

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

name: HERBAL FACIAL STEAM
description:
♥♡☽☽☽☽ HERBAL STEAM - FACE TEA ☾☾☾☾♡♥

An herbal steam is the best way for a deep pore cleansing.
Each of the flowers and herbs selected are rich in nutrients that nourish and tone the skin. The aromatic oils of the plants are released by the heat and absorbed by the skin. It's like drinking tea... with your face!

Use once or twice a month, after cleansing and before moisturizing.

TO USE: Toss 1-2 tablespoons of Face Tea into a pot of 3 cups just boiled water, cover and allow to steep for ten minutes. Place pot on heatproof surface, drape a towel over head and pot to capture steam. Uncover pot, inhale deeply and unwind. Lift towel to regulate heat. Steam for 5-8 minutes.

TIP: strain remaining tea and use as a final hair rinse for naturally healthy and lustrous hair.

Choose from: 
NORMAL - OILY skin; with 6 organic herbs including rose, peppermint, sage and more

NORMAL - DRY skin; with 6 organic herbs including comfrey, lavender, calendula and more


MADE WITH ☮ ♡ & :
all certified organic flowers, leaves, herbs and roots.
Full ingredient list and directions for use on each package


available in: 
-Normal to Dry skin types
-Normal to Oily skin types

comes in 
4 ounce amber glass jar 


☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

name: BOTANICAL PERFUME OIL
description:
Our Botanical Perfume Solids are our own unique blends of organic essential oils, absolutes and resins hand blended into a base of organic jojoba oil.

Every perfume is hand-blended and hand-poured individually
or in very small batches so that full care and attention go in to every one.

Natural perfume will evolve over time and should be applied to the skin in order to truly unfold.
Most of our scents are unisex and can be worn alone or mixed and
matched to create your own blend.


☽☽☽ Available Scents ☾☾☾

❤NEW❤
R I T U A L - the ancient Indian tradition of Ayurveda recommends that women wear jasmine on their hands, patchouli on their necks, musk on the abdomen, sandalwood on their thighs, saffron on their feet and amber on the breasts. This sensual blend is inspired by this recommendation.

❤NEW❤
C H U R C H -frankincense, myrrh, patchouli, sandalwood, rose, clary sage, cinnamon.
Spiritual and meditative. Incense lingering in an old, wooden house of worship.

S H A M A N - aged patchouli, lavender, cedarwood and california white sage.
Earthy and fresh, unisex and everyone's favorite.

W H I T E M A G I C -frankincense, ylang ylang, fresh ginger and orange.
Warming, heady floral and fresh citrus.

J A S M I N E -jasmine absolute, benzoin and neroli.
Sweet and nostalgic, just like the creamy white flowers.

H U N T E R -fir absolute, fir needle, cedarwoods and pine.
Forest like with notes of fruity jam.

S H R I N E -benzoin, labdanum and organic vanillia absolute.
Our take on 'amber', only drier, smokier and better.

H A R L O T -tobacco absolute, rose, clove and pepper.
Exotic and spiced, the delicate flower bathed in sweetened tobacco.

B L U M O O N -lavender, ylang ylang, jasmine and pink grapefruit.
Almost sedative, completely peaceful. Light floral with uplifting citrus.

☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾
BOTANICAL PERFUME OIL comes packaged in a 10ml {.33 fl oz.} glass bottle
with roll on applicator.
☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

Some resins are not oil soluble and may contain natural sediment. This is normal and adds to the natural beauty of the perfume! Simply roll the bottle between your palms before use to re-blend the materials and oil.


☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☽☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾☾

HANDMADE IN CALIFORNIA

**We are constantly brewing up something new, check back often for new potions!

name: The October Union Tank- New Silver
description:
We just found ONE more of these bad boys in a size medium, thing is....

as you may have noticed, we're addicted to all things naturally yummy smelling, so we placed a bag of lavender in with this tank. 
Bottom line: the tank absorbed some of the natural oils of the lavender which caused a small, slight discoloration of the tank. It is on the bottom by the hem and honestly HARDLY noticeable. It's just slightly lighter than the rest of the shirt is all. 
Sooo, our oops gets you a $2 off discount. (price as marked) Because the shirt still rocks and the lightness may come off upon washing. 

Snatch this last gem up, cause it is like the last of the really great wangdoodles, once it's gone, it's gone FOR-EV-VER!





The October Union Tank in "new silver" color. Logo on front, text on back.

This tank is unisex so you can buy one for your boyfriend then steal it for yourself.

Tan leather belt has painted and stamped details such as trees, mountains, a stag with antlers, the Moon, the Sun, a rainbow, a fish, an owl and water. 

This belt is truly amazing and unique, photos just don't do it justice.
